LocalBusiness.name: branchOf
LocalBusiness.description: The larger organization that this local business is a branch of, if any.

LocalBusiness.name: currenciesAccepted
LocalBusiness.description: The currency accepted (in ISO 4217 currency format).

LocalBusiness.name: openingHours
LocalBusiness.description: The opening hours for a business. Opening hours can be specified as a weekly time range, starting with days, then times per day. Multiple days can be listed with commas ',' separating each day. Day or time ranges are specified using a hyphen '-'.- Days are specified using the following two-letter combinations: Mo, Tu, We, Th, Fr, Sa, Su.- Times are specified using 24:00 time. For example, 3pm is specified as 15:00. - Here is an example: Tuesdays and Thursdays 4-8pm. - If a business is open 7 days a week, then it can be specified as Monday through Sunday, all day.

LocalBusiness.name: priceRange
LocalBusiness.description: The price range of the business, for example $$$.

Organization.name: address
Organization.description: Physical address of the item.

Organization.name: aggregateRating
Organization.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

Organization.name: brand
Organization.description: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

Organization.name: contactPoint
Organization.description: A contact point for a person or organization. Supersedes contactPoints.

Organization.name: department
Organization.description: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours). For example: a store with a pharmacy, or a bakery with a cafe.

Organization.name: dissolutionDate
Organization.description: The date that this organization was dissolved.

Organization.name: duns
Organization.description: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

Organization.name: email
Organization.description: Email address.

Organization.name: employee
Organization.description: Someone working for this organization. Supersedes employees.

Organization.name: event
Organization.description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action. Supersedes events.

Organization.name: faxNumber
Organization.description: The fax number.

Organization.name: founder
Organization.description: A person who founded this organization. Supersedes founders.

Organization.name: foundingDate
Organization.description: The date that this organization was founded.

Organization.name: foundingLocation
Organization.description: The place where the Organization was founded.

Organization.name: globalLocationNumber
Organization.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

Organization.name: hasPOS
Organization.description: Points-of-Sales operated by the organization or person.

Organization.name: interactionCount
Organization.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this itemâ€”for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

Organization.name: isicV4
Organization.description: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

Organization.name: legalName
Organization.description: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.

Organization.name: location
Organization.description: The location of the event, organization or action.

Organization.name: logo
Organization.description: An associated logo.

Organization.name: makesOffer
Organization.description: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person.

Organization.name: member
Organization.description: A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals. Supersedes members, musicGroupMember. Inverse property: memberOf.

Organization.name: memberOf
Organization.description: An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs. Inverse property: member.

Organization.name: naics
Organization.description: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.

Organization.name: owns
Organization.description: Products owned by the organization or person.

Organization.name: review
Organization.description: A review of the item. Supersedes reviews.

Organization.name: seeks
Organization.description: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (demand).

Organization.name: subOrganization
Organization.description: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second, e.g., as a subsidiary. See also: the more specific 'department' property.

Organization.name: taxID
Organization.description: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.

Organization.name: telephone
Organization.description: The telephone number.

Organization.name: vatID
Organization.description: The Value-added Tax ID of the organization or person.

Thing.name: additionalType
Thing.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

Thing.name: potentialAction
Thing.description: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.

Thing.name: sameAs
Thing.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

Place.name: aggregateRating
Place.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

Place.name: containedIn
Place.description: The basic containment relation between places.

Place.name: event
Place.description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action. Supersedes events.

Place.name: geo
Place.description: The geo coordinates of the place.

Place.name: globalLocationNumber
Place.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

Place.name: hasMap
Place.description: A URL to a map of the place. Supersedes map, maps.

Place.name: interactionCount
Place.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this itemâ€”for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

Place.name: isicV4
Place.description: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

Place.name: openingHoursSpecification
Place.description: The opening hours of a certain place.

Place.name: photo
Place.description: A photograph of this place. Supersedes photos.

Place.name: review
Place.description: A review of the item. Supersedes reviews.
